data.title: *Most favorite Video Game character ever* | Just For Fun Discussion
data.meta_description: Just list your favorite video game character(s) and the game/series they were in. Mine are: Jin Kazuya (From Tekken series), Ratchet (From Ratchet & Cla
data.text:
Just list your favorite video game character(s) and the game/series they were in.

Mine are:

Jin Kazuya (From Tekken series),

Ratchet (From Ratchet & Clank series), and

Sweet Tooth (From Twisted Metal series).

Quote

Funny: Ledah… (Riviera the promised land)

Comic: Sully (Uncharted)

Platonic Love: Aya Breah (Parasite Eve)

Last edited Apr 03, 2013 at 12:09PM EDT

Quote

Dr. Robotnik, from the Sonic the Hedgehog series,

And GLaDOS, from Portal… you monster.

Wait, wait, WAIT. Did you mean only playable video game characters or any video game character?

Dr. Eggman wrote:

Dr. Robotnik, from the Sonic the Hedgehog series,

And GLaDOS, from Portal… you monster.

Wait, wait, WAIT. Did you mean only playable video game characters or any video game character?

I guess you can do NPCs too.

Oh, yeah, P.S; That picture of Eggman is frickin' HUGE!

Quote

0.Me

1. Solid Snake

2. The cast of TF2, I find all the characters likable (except the scout, fuck scouts)

3.GLaDOS

4.Francis and Bill "Horseshit" Overbeck

5.Me

6.Me

7.Me

8.Me

9.Me again

10.Me dang it!

I think I've posted some of these before, but…

Wario

I love villainous characters for some reason. Wario is just fun to play as, and he has personality.

Dr. Robotnik

Once again, villains. Also because he goes on our forums.

Asha (Monster World IV)

A case of a perfectly good video game getting thrown under the bus. Asha was the female heroine before a lot of female heroines ever entered into gaming. She also isn't over-sexualized. If anything, she's just as strong as the average guy character, and I kind of like playing as her because of that.

Viewtiful Joe

Cool design, great game, etc. I have a thing for Japanese superheroes.

There are probably more that I'm not thinking of.

Quote

Samus Aran . Not only is she hot (and doesn't matter, because 90% of the time she's in the suit) but she's pretty strong.

Someone already mentioned Snake, so I'll go with The Boss . She is responsible for one of the saddest endings I've seen.

Mr. Red from Total Distortion. I just love the way he speaks and the lack of interest in your situation.

And I'll go with Kirby too. Who doesn't love him?
